lines.text: The shroud of agony will rip the answer from your brain!
Your aim is poor for one with three eyes.
The world would be such a dull place without men.
I knew he was a hero. Knew it even before he knew it.
For countless ages I have waited for the one who would return my eye to me and release me from this captivity.
What? By all the beasts in the pitt! This is only part of the eye!
you'll learn the true meaning of agony.
From who? You? You're a failure, you're a mistake. You're a pathetic freak of nature. I'm doing the world a favor by removing you from it.
